text: The Gambia is divided into eight local government areas. They are: #Banjul #Basse #Brikama #Janjanbureh #Kanifing #Kerewan #Kuntaur #Mansakonko ==See also== *Divisions of the Gambia *List of local government areas of the Gambia by Human Development Index Category:Local Government Areas of the Gambia
title: Local government areas of the Gambia
